Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Establishes a leave of absence for veterans on Veterans Day
Summary: Establishes a leave of absence for veterans on Veterans Day, November 11th.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing a leave of absence for veterans
